title: We're getting married!
content:

Save the Date! On Saturday, November 23rd, 2024 at 12:00 PM, we will celebrate our marriage at Parroquia Nuestra SeÃ±ora de BelÃ©n in Crevillent, Alicante. 



We would love to celebrate this special day with you!






âœï¸


RSVP


Please confirm your attendance and provide other important details by October 31st by filling out the following questionnaire (one response per person):



Loadingâ€¦





ğŸ¥‚


Planning of the Day


The ceremony will take place at Parroquia Nuestra SeÃ±ora de BelÃ©n in Crevillente (Alicante) at 12:00 PM. The celebration will continue at Finca Los Pinos in Orihuela (Alicante).



  
    Ceremony ğŸ’
    
  
  
    Celebration ğŸ¾
    
  



From Elche/Murcia to the event

ğŸš Buses



The current bus schedule (subject to change) is as follows:

Outbound:


  Elche â†’ Crevillente: Departure at 11:00 AM from Museu ArqueolÃ²gic i dâ€™HistÃ²ria dâ€™Elx
  Murcia â†’ Crevillente: Departure at 10:45 AM from Plaza Circular



Return:


  Finca Los Pinos â†’ Crevillente: Departure at 9:00 PM
  Finca Los Pinos â†’ Crevillente â†’ Elche: Departure at 1:00 AM
  Finca Los Pinos â†’ Murcia: Departure at 1:00 AM


ğŸš• Taxi

If you need a taxi, you can contact the following numbers:



  Radio Taxi Murcia: +34 968248800
  Radio Taxi Elche: +34 965427777
  Radio Taxi Orihuela: +34 966740202


*Availability of other services like Uber or Cabify may vary depending on the city.


Weather

Check out the weather forecast! Most of the time we will be indoors, but if the weather permits, part of the celebration will be held outside.


CREVILLENTE WEATHER







The trip ğŸ›«


Accommodation


Unfortunately, there are not many accommodation options close to the ceremony and celebration venues. Therefore, we suggest a few options in Elche and Murcia near the bus departure/arrival points.



Elche


  Ibis Elche
    
  
  Hotel Elche Centro
    
      Limited availability.
      Direct booking link (with discount).
    
  
  JardÃ­n Milenio
    
      Get a discount by booking through your mobile device and signing up as a "PORT FRIEND".
    
  
  Airbnb
  



Murcia


  Sercotel JC1 Murcia
     
    
  
  AC Hotel Murcia
     
    
  





The trip ğŸ›«


Traveling to Elche/Murcia


If youâ€™re coming from outside the area, here are some options for reaching our location besides driving:


âœˆï¸ By plane


  
    Elche: Aeropuerto de Alicante-Elche Miguel HernÃ¡ndez
  
  
    Murcia: Aeropuerto Internacional RegiÃ³n de Murcia
  


ğŸš„ By train


  
    Elche: EstaciÃ³n Elx Parc
  
  
    Murcia: EstaciÃ³n Murcia del Carmen
  


Flying to Alicante and staying in Murcia?

If so, you have several transportation options:


  Car rental: Alicante Airport works with companies like SIXT, Goldcar, Hertz, Avis, Europcar and others.
  Bus: Alsa offers direct trips between the airport and Murciaâ€™s bus station (view on Google Maps). The trip takes about an hour and costs around 4â€“6 euros.
  Taxi: The most convenient but also the most expensive option. The trip can cost around 115 euros. More information here.
  Train: Likely the slowest and most complicated option. Itâ€™s best not to consider it.





The trip ğŸ›«


Stay


If youâ€™re planning to spend a few more days in the area, here are some recommendations:


Elche

What to do?


  Historic Center: Explore the old town of Elche with its narrow streets, charming squares, and historic buildings.
  Basilica of Santa MarÃ­a: Visit this stunning Baroque basilica, famous for hosting the Misteri dâ€™Elx.
  Palmeral of Elche: Stroll through this vast palm grove, a UNESCO World Heritage site with over 200,000 palm trees.


Where to eat?


  Tapas: La Olivereta, Tabarca, Casa Zarracina, Chico Calla, Marcelino: Vinos y Enjundias, Garaje o La Lateria.
  More food: Mestizaje o Restaurante Parres (paella).




Murcia

What to do?


  Historic Center: Wander through the old town, filled with squares, churches, and historic buildings.
  Murcia Cathedral: Visit the Cathedral of Santa MarÃ­a, which features Gothic, Renaissance, and Baroque styles. Climb the tower for panoramic views.
  Plaza del Cardenal Belluga: Explore the central square, home to the Episcopal Palace and the Baroque facade of the cathedral.


Where to eat?


  Plaza de las Flores: Enjoy tapas at one of the popular restaurants or bars in this bustling square in Murcia.






Misc. ğŸª©


Music


Is there a song youâ€™d like to hear at our wedding? 
Click here to join the playlist and add any songs you want!







Misc. ğŸª©


Gifts


Sharing this day with you is already the best gift. If youâ€™d like to contribute to our honeymoon, you can do so in the following way:



ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¸ ES48 2100 3356 6422 0018 7835



ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡± NL44 ABNA 0871 8787 39

Contact us


If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact us:

El tiempo

Â¡Ã‰chale un ojo a la predicciÃ³n meteorolÃ³gica! La mayorÃ­a del tiempo estaremos en espacios interiores, pero si el tiempo lo permite, parte de la celebraciÃ³n serÃ¡ en exterior.

Viaje ğŸ›«

Viajar a Elche/Murcia

Vuelas a Alicante y te quedas en Murcia?

Si es asÃ­, tienes varias opciones para el transporte:


  Coche de alquiler: El Aeropuerto de Alicante trabaja con empresas como SIXT, Goldcar, Hertz, Avis, Europcar y otras.
  AutobÃºs: La empresa Alsa ofrece viajes directos entre el aeropuerto y la estaciÃ³n de autobuses de Murcia (ver en Google Maps). El trayecto es de una hora, aproximadamente, y el precio estÃ¡ sobre los 4â€“6 euros.
  Taxi: La opciÃ³n mÃ¡s cÃ³moda pero tambiÃ©n la mÃ¡s cara. El viaje puede costar sobre los 115 euros. MÃ¡s informaciÃ³n aquÃ­.
  Tren: Seguramente la opciÃ³n mÃ¡s lenta y complicada. Mejor no considerarla.
